section.title: Supported schema languages
section.p:
Although is not validating the input, uses information from the document associated schema. The supported schema languages:
XML Schema
DTD
Relax NG

section.title: Entities
section.p: All XML entities are expanded prior processing.

section.title: xi:include
section.p: All the xi:included fragments are expanded prior processing.

section.title: Default attributes
section.p: The default and fixed attributes defined in the associated schema are taken into account when the CSS rules are applied.
For instance, the DITA class attributes are defined in the DTD rather than the XML instance - the CSS rules are usually matching this attribute, not the element names.
